8 January 2005 |- ! |- ! colspan="2" style="text-align: center" | ''â'' [[2003â04 Manchester City F.C. season|2003â04]] {{0}} {{0}} {{0}} [[File:Soccerball current event.svg|30px]] {{0}} {{0}} {{0}} [[2005â06 Manchester City F.C. season|2005â06]] ''â'' |} {| class="infobox" cellspacing="5" style="width: 30em; font-size: 90%; text-align: center;" | colspan="5" style="font-size: 130%; font-weight: bold;" | Results summary - all competitions |- !style="width:20%"| !!style="width:20%"|Wins!!style="width:20%"|Draws!!style="width:20%"|Losses!!style="width:20%"|Win % |- |'''Home'''||9 ||6 ||6 ||42.9% |- |'''Away'''||5 ||7 ||8 ||25.0% |- |'''Both'''||14||13||14||34.1% |} {| class="infobox" cellspacing="5" style="width: 30em; font-size: 90%; text-align: center;" | colspan="5" style="font-size: 130%; font-weight: bold;" | Results summary - Premier League |- !style="width:20%"| !!style="width:20%"|Wins!!style="width:20%"|Draws!!style="width:20%"|Losses!!style="width:20%"|Win % |- |'''Home'''||8 ||6 ||5 ||42.1% |- |'''Away'''||5 ||7 ||7 ||26.3% |- |'''Both'''||13||13||12||34.2% |} The [[2004â05 in English football|'''2004â05 season''']] was [[Manchester City F.C.|'''Manchester City Football Club''']]'s third consecutive season playing in the [[Premier League]], the top division of [[Football in England|English football]], and its eighth season since the Premier League was first created with Manchester City as one of the its original 22 founding member clubs. Overall, it was the team's 113th season playing in a division of English [[Association football|football]], most of which have been spent in the top flight.

== Season review == {{Empty section | date=January 2011}}

== Team kit == The team kit was produced by [[Reebok]] and the shirt sponsor was [[Thomas Cook AG|Thomas Cook]]. {| border="0" |{{Football kit box | align = none center | pattern_la = | pattern_b = | pattern_ra = | pattern_sh = | pattern_so = | leftarm = aad0ff | body = aad0ff | rightarm = aad0ff | shorts = ffffff | socks = aad0ff | title = Home }} |{{Football kit box | align = none center | pattern_la = | pattern_b = | pattern_ra = | pattern_sh = | pattern_so = | leftarm = ffOOaa | body = ffffff | rightarm = ffOOaa | shorts = 000000 | socks = ffffff | title = Away }} |{{Football kit box | align = none center | pattern_la = _blacklower | pattern_b = _blackstripes | pattern_ra = _blacklower | pattern_sh = | pattern_so = | leftarm = d20000 | body = d20000 | rightarm = d20000 | shorts = 000000 | socks = 000000 | title = Third kit }} |} {{Expand section | date=November 2010}}

== Historical league performance == Prior to this season, the history of Manchester City's performance in the English football league hierarchy since the creation of the Premier League in 1992 is summarised by the following timeline chart â which commences with the last season (1991-92) of the old Football League First Division (from which the Premier League was formed).
